articles.title: Terrifying NASA Video Shows America Spewing CO2 Into Atmosphere - Futurism
articles.description: NASA has released a new visualization that shows copious amounts of carbon dioxide swirling around the Earth's atmosphere.
articles.content:
The level of detail is "tremendous."
Car Bon Pain
NASA has released a new visualization that shows copious amounts of carbon dioxide wafting off the Earth and swirling through the atmosphere.
